metadata.title: CVE-2013-1835 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Moodle 2.x through 2.1.10, 2.2.x before 2.2.8, 2.3.x before 2.3.5, and2.4.x before 2.4.2 allows remote authenticated administrators to obtainsensitive information from the external repositories of arbitrary users byleveraging the login_as feature.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
